projects.description: A random quote generator that returns an insightful quote every fifteen seconds, and/or upon request.
Dynamically displays a list of 42 students over multiple pages, using pagination. Also includes a live search function to search through the entire list of students.
A customized form with added conditional behavior and interactivity. Includes form validation with helpful error messages.

A browser-based word guessing game, using JavaScript and Object-Oriented Programming to select a random, hidden phrase, which the player tries to guess by clicking letters on an onscreen keyboard. Added functionality includes ability to use physical keyboard to select letters in the phrase.

Using the Random User Generator API, this app lists 12 randomly generated employees from a fictitous startup company, and dynamically lists their information to the screen. Users have the ability to click the cards to see further information for an employee. Users may also perform a real-time search on the employees list.
A version of John Conway's Game of Life in the browser. Includes ability to change the game board/grid in real-time and the abilities to randomize and clear the grid.
